item.title: Building a Home Cinema on a Shoestring
item.description: I love going to the cinema, but I’ve always been disappointed that I can’t see older films and I can’t see them when it’s convenient for me. There have always been ways to watch films at home, but even today when large screens and high-definition formats are ubiquitous, it’s just not the same as the cinema experience. There’s something completely different about the big screen that a TV in a living room can’t replicate.
